{{ row.idx }} {{ frappe.format_value (doc.opening_balance, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }} {{ row.particulars}} {{ row.quantity }} {{ row.rate }} {{ frappe.format_value (row.amount, {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}} {{frappe.format_value (doc.closing_balance, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
